alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:17AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Strong/Severe thunderstorms are expected from about 2 PM this Afternoon until Midnight Tonight mostly over Northwest portions of the Region... Strong/Severe thunderstorms are expected across mostly Northwest Maine later this afternoon into this evening, but could also include portions of Northeast and Central highlands of Maine. The main concern with thunderstorms this event are damaging winds but storms may also contain hail and very heavy rainfall. Remember, in today`s environment, thunderstorms can quickly become severe, producing large hail, damaging winds, deadly lightning, and very heavy rainfall. Continue to monitor the National Weather Service or your local media outlet for updates on this developing weather situation.
